column5: Comfy and quiet, shabby chic beach condo is your next home away from home. Located on the west end of the Island, we are minutes away from Moody Gardens and Schlitterbahn and located right next to multiple public beach access points with free parking, as well as a quick walk to the ocean.   The choice is yours, turn left on Seawall Blvd and be at the Pleasure Pier in a few minutes or turn right and head towards more pristine and private areas.
